挑.definition: to raise; to dig up; to poke; to prick; to incite; to stir up

挑三揀四.definition: to be picky; to be choosy

挑動.definition: to entice; to arouse; to provoke

挑唆.definition: to incite; to stir up; to instigate

挑大梁.definition: to play a leading role; to bear a heavy responsibility

挑山工.definition: laborers who carry cargo up and down the mountains on shoulder poles

挑弄.definition: to incite; to provoke; to tease

挑揀.definition: to pick and choose; to select

挑撥是非.definition: to incite a quarrel (idiom); to sow discord between people; to tell tales; to make mischief

挑撥離間.definition: to sow dissension (idiom); to drive a wedge between

挑明.definition: to illuminate; to open up (a topic)

挑毛剔刺.definition: to find fault; to carp; nitpicking

挑毛剔刺兒.definition: erhua variant of 挑毛剔刺[tiao1 mao2 ti1 ci4]

挑毛病.definition: to nitpick; petty criticism; to nag

挑燈.definition: to light a lamp; to raise a lantern

挑燈夜戰.definition: to raise a lantern and fight at night (idiom); fig. to work into the night; to burn the midnight oil

挑肥嫌瘦.definition: to choose sth over another to suit one's own convenience

挑肥揀瘦.definition: (idiom) to cherry-pick; to pick the best parts for oneself; to be choosy

挑花眼.definition: (fig.) to get cross-eyed; to be bewildered

挑起.definition: to provoke; to stir up; to incite

挑逗.definition: to provoke; to entice; to lure; to tantalize; to tease; to titillate

挑頭.definition: to take the lead; to be first to (do sth); to pioneer

挑頭兒.definition: erhua variant of 挑頭|挑头[tiao3 tou2]

挑高.definition: (architecture) high-ceilinged; to raise (a ceiling) to a height of; ceiling height
